name: radioactivity_concentration_of_245Am_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Am" means the element "americium" and "245Am" is the isotope "americium-245" with a half-life of 8.75e-02 days.
